entry.codeblock: This element refers to the single work whose reputation greatly exceeds all others, according to external criteria (best known in literary circles), and can occur once per genre for some writers.

<RBESTKNOWNWORK> <BIBCITS ID="">{1,1}</BIBCITS> <DATE annotationId="" CALENDAR="NEWSTYLE" CERTAINTY="CERT" ID="" offsetId="" VALUE="">{1,1}</DATE> <KEYWORDCLASS annotationId="" KEYWORDTYPE="" offsetId="">{1,1}</KEYWORDCLASS> <NAME annotationId="" offsetId="" REF="" STANDARD="">{1,1}</NAME> <ORGNAME annotationId="" offsetId="" ORGTYPE="" REF="" REG="" STANDARD="">{1,1}</ORGNAME> CONTROVERSYDATE="">{1,1}</PAUTHORSHIP> <PCIRCULATION>{1,1}</PCIRCULATION> <PCOPYRIGHT>{1,1}</PCOPYRIGHT> <PDEDICATION>{1,1}</PDEDICATION> <PEARNINGS>{1,1}</PEARNINGS> <PEDITIONS>{1,1}</PEDITIONS>
